scripts.pwtestheadless: npx playwright test --project=chromium --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report
scripts.pwtestheaded: npx playwright test --headed --project=chromium --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report
scripts.pwtest20: npx playwright test --headed --project=chromium --workers=1 --repeat-each=10 && npx playwright show-report
